tool_description: Document level topic extraction for multiple languages: English, French, German, Dutch, Italian, Portuguese, Greek, Spanish
name: DocTop
title: DocTop

api_list.name: Spanish topics
api_list.description: Extract topics from a document(s) in Spanish
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://doctop.p.rapidapi.com/es"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "doctop.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
